title: One Piece: Little Garden Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Unknown
description: A comprehensive recap and review of the Little Garden arc, which includes Episode 72. The article describes the arc as 'a captivating adventure filled with charismatic characters, comedic moments, and thrilling action.'

title: One Piece Little Garden Arc (70-77) Review
author: dlstudios
description: A detailed review of the entire Little Garden arc spanning episodes 70-77, including analysis of the sacred duel between the giants and the Baroque Works subplot.

title: He's A Rubber Whaaaaa? - Little Garden Arc Discussion
author: Unknown
description: Podcast discussion covering the Little Garden arc. The podcast is also available on YouTube and features analysis of One Piece arcs and episodes.

title: First Time Watching One Piece | Discussing Little Garden - Weekly Discussion
author: Community
description: Forum discussion with first-time One Piece watchers discussing the Little Garden arc, including reactions to the sacred duel and Mr. 3's schemes.

title: Episode 72 - One Piece Wiki
author: Community Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 72, containing episode details, plot summary, character appearances, trivia, and production credits.

title: One Piece: A Straw Hat Finally Achieved Part Of Their Dream
author: Unknown
description: Article discussing how Usopp's dream to visit Elbaf, which originated in Episode 72 during the Little Garden arc, was finally fulfilled over 1000 episodes later in the story.

title: One Piece: Mr. 3 Deserves More Credit
author: Unknown
description: Analysis article discussing Mr. 3's cunning tactics throughout the series, including his scheme in the Little Garden arc where he sabotaged the giants' sacred duel.

title: 'One Piece' Refresher: Who Are Dorry and Brogy?
author: Unknown
description: Character guide explaining the backstory and significance of Dorry and Brogy, the two giants whose sacred duel is the focus of the Little Garden arc.
